content: सौर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सूरस्य इदं मूरो देवतास्य वा अण्] {@--1@} Relating to the sun, solar. {@--2@} Sacred or dedicated to the sun. {@--3@} Worshipping the sun. {@--4@} Celestial, divine. {@--5@} Relating to spirituous liquor. --रः {@--1@} A worshipper of the sun. {@--2@} The planet Saturn. {@--3@} A solar month. {@--4@} A solar day. {@--5@} The plant called Tumburu. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yama, the god of death. --रं <ab>N.</ab> of a collection of hymns (extracted from the Ṛgveda) addressed to {%Sūrya%}.
